doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
1999 converted into Medical Alumni Association offices

2 Story Brick, 2/3 Georgian Townhouse Plan, 3 Bay, Flemish Bond, 5 Course American Bond, 5 Course American with Flemish Bond, Diagonal Chimney, Chimney Curtain, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Symmetrical Trim, Rondel Blocks, 2 Leaf Door, 4 Panel Doors with Applied Moldings, Transom, 6/6, 9/9, 6/6/6, Triple Hung Sash, Barred Cellar Windows, Blinds, Kitchen
James Dinsmore?--J W Nimmo on door frame--Robert Boucheron, Architect 1999
survey data: Charlottesville's Historic Landmarks Study Surveys--Virginia Road Traces--National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Studies in Vernacular Architecture
1113 W Main St, Dinsmore Lot #9, Charlottesville
